official-title.#text: To repeal the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act and health care-related provisions in the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010.

attestation-date.#text: Passed the House of Representatives May 16, 2013.

header.#text: Repeal of PPACA and health care-related provisions in the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010

text.#text: Effective as of the enactment of the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , such Act is repealed, and the provisions of law amended or repealed by such Act are restored or revived as if such Act had not been enacted.
